name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: StreamQR - show current URL as QR Code

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a QR code for URL of the active browser tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The StreamQR browser extension might come in handy whenever you want to share a link URL with your watchers during the video stream.
